What are the genetic changes related to catecholaminergic polymorphic ventricular tachycardia ?,"CPVT can result from mutations in two genes, RYR2 and CASQ2. RYR2 gene mutations cause about half of all cases, while mutations in the CASQ2 gene account for 1 percent to 2 percent of cases.
